employers.summary: Performed as a team contributor and as an individual, in multiple projects and teams, excelling towards client impact and satisfaction.
roles: Analysing existing and developing complex multi module, multi featured web applications.

Integration of latest and most compatible technologies in the projects.
Working with SCRUM and Agile approach.
Implementation of best approaches and practices, such as Test Driven Development (TDD), Domain Driven Development (DDD), Model View Controller (MVC) etc. .
Maintaining code quality at its best through Code Reviews.
Implementing UI build process using various build tools like Gulp, grunt, webpack etc. .

employers.summary: Performed as a team contributor and as an individual, in multiple projects and teams, excelling towards client impact and satisfaction. Worked on multiple projects from financial markets and education industries.
roles: Integration and development of Angularjs and jQuery in ASP.net web forms and MVC applications
Integration and development of Web APIs in .Net application using Angularjs
Client Interaction through Requirement Calls and Meetings.
Maintaining code quality at its best through Code Reviews.
Registering and setting up Domains and Sub-Domains.

roles: Identifying, targeting, acquisition, and retaining clientele by performing marketing and management activities.

projects.name: AYCO, Marketing Site
projects.summary: AYCO is a Goldman Sachs Company, and this project is a marketing site developed using Adobe AEM6 for the content pages and JavaScript, CSS3, Highcharts at the UI development.

projects.name: DAS (Digital Advertising Solutions) Campaign
projects.summary: Digital Advertising Solutions, Provides a range of services to the client, like Document Dropbox, Marketing Campaigns, Automated real time and marketing campaign Emails etc.

projects.name: GSAM (Goldman Sachs Assets Marketing)
projects.summary: Goldman Sachs Asset Management (GSAM) is one of the world’s leading investment managers. Across 33 offices worldwide, Goldman Sachs extend these global capabilities to the world’s leading pension plans, sovereign wealth funds, central banks, insurance companies, financial institutions, endowments, foundations, individuals and family offices, for whom it invest or advise on more than $1 trillion of assets.

projects.name: GSCIO-PE (Goldman Sachs CIO - Portfolio Explorer)
projects.summary: Goldman Sachs CIO Portfolio Explorer provides a detailed analysis of client portfolio and cash flows with the help of complex visualizations using various tables, graph and charts.

projects.name: GS-AIMS University
projects.summary: Goldman Sachs AIMS University provides a range of educational programs, courses, course modules, lessons, instructor courses, and quizzes. It keeps track of the users learning progress.

projects.name: GSCIO-AIMS (Goldman Sachs CIO - Alternate Investment Manager Selection)
projects.summary: The Alternative Investments & Manager Selection (“AIMS”) provides investors with investment and advisory solutions, across leading hedge fund managers, private equity funds, real estate managers, public equity strategies, fixed income strategies etc. .

projects.name: IMS (Insurance Management System)
projects.summary: Secure Vision's Insurance Management System (IMS), automates the key processes involved in providing multiple Insurance plans to its customers and experience to its users with user friendly subsystems. This also provides Secure Vision a platform to manage Insurance business and its clientele.

projects.name: MISMS (Multiple Installment Scheme Management System)
projects.summary: Secure Vision's MISMS (Multiple Installment Scheme Management System), automates the processes involved in managing Multiple Installment Scheme and experience to its users with user friendly subsystems.

projects.name: NAIP, Nematology Project
projects.summary: NAIP, a research project carried by division of Nematology, Indian Agricultural Research Institute (IARI), New Delhi. The project provides detailed information regarding its evolution, history, progress, deliverable, National Training,work allocations, expected outcomes, published papers, environmental and social issues, timelines etc..

projects.name: CBSE Learning
projects.summary: CBSE Learning was a public facing web site with authentication and authorization features, that provides authors and moderators to compose and publish Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE)'s learning materials like Sample Papers,  Question Papers, Chapters, latest CBSE news and events, Solved Questions from experts and many other features. This also provides administrator's desktop panel, that provides detailed information for analysis and administer. Public Users can register, login and access public and featured contents.

education.name: Bachelor of Science

additionals.title: Awards & Certifications
bullets: A-Level, 1 year Diploma in Information Technology in 2003 from DOEACC Society, Ministry of Information Technology, New Delhi.
Awarded National Mathematics Olympiad Certificate, 1996.
Sapient Core Values, recognition certificate, for extraordinary experiences for clients and their customers.
Multiple recognition from team members across projects at Sapient.

additionals.title: Successful POCs
bullets: POC done using D3 Charts and Angular js, the goal was to represent a complex data coming from multiple sources in a Multi branch Hierarchical custom charts and add interactivity to nodes.
POC done using Angular js, Moodle, Adobe Captivate, and Adobe AEM, the goal was to integrate all of these to create a Custom LMS for an existing Application.

POC done using Angular js, Gulp js, Bootstrap, Highcharts and DASH UI (a Goldman Sachs native Framework), the goal was to develop a Client Portfolio Explorer and Integrate DASH UI framework to have complex tables and charts.
POC done using Block Chain, Angular js, Node js and Bootstrap, the goal was to implement multiple node servers and develop a lending application using Block Chain.

POC done using Adobe Campaign, the goal was to write and introduce a JavaScript in between the Marketing Campaign Workflow, which processes Lakhs of prospects in batches and recreates them with additional data based on some business rules.
POC done using jekyll, liquid templates, and Adobe Campaign, the goal was to automate the email content creation for Adobe Campaign.
POC done using react and redux, the goal was to integrate and implement new modules with react components, redux store in existing complex, JavaScript Module Pattern Project.
POC done using intro.js, Angular js, the goal was to develop an interactive step by step help tutorial for an existing project.

additionals.title: Training and Seminars Facilitated
additionals.summary: I have contributed by sharing my knowledge by various ways:
bullets: Angular js 1.6 | Workshop and Classroom Session to teams at Sapient Noida, India | 6 days, 2 hours each day.
Wep Pack 3 | Classrom Session to teams at Sapient Noida, India.
Wep Pack 3  | WebEx Session to teams at Sapient across Globe.
JavaScript Module Pattern | Classroom Session to team at Sapient Noida, India.
CSS - Best Practices | Classroom Session to teams at RedArrow India.
Integrating ASP.Net MVC and Angular js Classroom Session to teams at RedArrow India.
Presented in National Seminars at college.

additionals.summary: Gaining interest and knowledge in following growing areas of technology and science:
bullets: Artificial Intelligence
Machine Learning

basicInfo.overview:
When I saw this tweet it struck me, because I realized that it has been a long time since I have optimized a page for print or even spared a thought on checking.  Maybe it’s due to the constant resizing of our browsers and making sure that our sites work perfectly in all shapes and sizes or maybe it’s just because I rarely print web pages myself. Whatever it is, I totally forgot about print style sheets and that’s bad. 

Optimizing web pages for print is important because we want our sites to be as accessible as possible, no matter the medium. We shouldn’t make assumptions about our users and their behavior. People still print web pages. Just think about articles or blog posts, recipes, contact information, and directions or real estate sites. Someone somewhere will eventually try to print one of the pages you made.

bullets: A-Level, 1 year Diploma in Information Technology in 2003 from DOEACC Society, Ministry of Information Technology, New Delhi.

Sapient Core Values, recognition certificate, for extraordinary experiences for clients and their customers.

additionals.title: Successful POCs
bullets: POC done using D3 Charts and Angular js, the goal was to represent a complex data coming from multiple sources in a Multi branch Hierarchical custom charts and add interactivity to nodes.
POC done using Angular js, Moodle, Adobe Captivate, and Adobe AEM, the goal was to integrate all of these to create a Custom LMS for an existing Application.

POC done using Angular js, Gulp js, Bootstrap, Highcharts and DASH UI (a Goldman Sachs native Framework), the goal was to develop a Client Portfolio Explorer and Integrate DASH UI framework to have complex tables and charts.
POC done using Block Chain, Angular js, Node js and Bootstrap, the goal was to implement multiple node servers and develop a lending application using Block Chain.

POC done using Adobe Campaign, the goal was to write and introduce a JavaScript in between the Marketing Campaign Workflow, which processes Lakhs of prospects in batches and recreates them with additional data based on some business rules.
POC done using jekyll, liquid templates, and Adobe Campaign, the goal was to automate the email content creation for Adobe Campaign.
POC done using react and redux, the goal was to integrate and implement new modules with react components, redux store in existing complex, JavaScript Module Pattern Project.
POC done using intro.js, Angular js, the goal was to develop an interactive step by step help tutorial for an existing project.
POC in-progress for developing Single Ecosystem for React Native (Android & IOS) and React Web Apps.

basicInfo.profileName: Senior Interactive Developer Level 2 | For Trainer | 10-Jan-2019
basicInfo.address: Aachvis Softech Pvt Ltd SEZ, GF Tower C, Plot No 7, Sec 144 Exp way
basicInfo.overview:
Mr. Sunil Kumar is Senior Interactive Developer L2, and working out of the Noida office within our Global market business unit. Mr. Sunil has been associated to Sapient for more than four years and has 11 years of experience in the IT consulting, software development and financial markets, and has been developing and working on complex Sapient frameworks and projects, which would help client to manage its business. Sunil is experienced and specialized front-end, skilled with an add-on knowledge of back end technologies and has been adding great value to the client’s business.

Prior to joining Sapient in June, 2014, Mr. Sunil was a Senior Programmer for RedArrow India, a leading website designing and development company. He holds a Masters degree in Business Administration (Marketing & International Business) from Guru Govind Singh Indraprastha University, New Delhi, and an A-Level Diploma in IT from DOEACC, Department of Electronics and IT, Government of India, New Delhi.   Mr. Sunil has worked and managed client accounts while working with International Commodities Market (COMEX) and Indian Commodities Market (MCX) trading as a part of Cosmo Tradex Pvt. Ltd. and Indiabulls Commodities Pvt. Ltd.

Sunil is a Sapient Certified Interviewer, and has contributed 120+ hours for assessing external and internal candidates. He has been actively sharing his knowledge and expertise across teams by Trainings and Workshops.

employers.summary: Performing as a team contributor and as an individual, in multiple projects and teams, excelling towards client impact and satisfaction.
roles: Analysing existing and developing complex multi module, multi featured web applications.
Led multiple POCs to success within and across Teams/Projects.
Integration of latest and most compatible technologies in the projects.
Working with SCRUM and Agile approach.
Implementation of best approaches and practices, such as Test Driven Development (TDD), Domain Driven Development (DDD), Model View Controller (MVC) etc. .
Maintaining code quality at its best through Code Reviews.
Implementing UI build process using various build tools like Gulp, grunt, webpack etc. .

employers.summary: Performed as a team contributor and as an individual, in multiple projects and teams, excelling towards client impact and satisfaction. Worked on multiple projects from financial markets and education industries.
roles: Integration and development of Angularjs and jQuery in ASP.net web forms and MVC applications
Integration and development of Web APIs in .Net application using Angularjs
Client Interaction through Requirement Calls and Meetings.
Maintaining code quality at its best through Code Reviews.
Registering and setting up Domains and Sub-Domains.

employers.summary:
Performed towards building and managing clientele and their investment portfolio. 
Dealt with Commodities & Bullion trading in Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX) of India.
roles: Identifying, targeting, acquisition, and retaining clientele by performing marketing and management activities.
Opening and maintaining clients' online and offline trading accounts.
Developing and assisting client in managing their investment portfolio.
Manage the pay in, pay out & cash.

roles: Identifying, targeting, acquisition, and retaining clientele by performing marketing and management activities.

projects.name: AYCO, Marketing Site
projects.summary: AYCO is a Goldman Sachs Company, and this project is a marketing site developed using Adobe AEM6 for the content pages and JavaScript, CSS3, Highcharts at the UI development.

projects.name: DAS (Digital Advertising Solutions) Campaign
projects.summary: Digital Advertising Solutions, Provides a range of services to the client, like Document Dropbox, Marketing Campaigns, Automated real time and marketing campaign Emails etc.

projects.name: GSAM (Goldman Sachs Assets Marketing)
projects.summary: Goldman Sachs Asset Management (GSAM) is one of the world’s leading investment managers. Across 33 offices worldwide, Goldman Sachs extend these global capabilities to the world’s leading pension plans, sovereign wealth funds, central banks, insurance companies, financial institutions, endowments, foundations, individuals and family offices, for whom it invest or advise on more than $1 trillion of assets.

projects.name: GSCIO-PE (Goldman Sachs CIO - Portfolio Explorer)
projects.summary: Goldman Sachs CIO Portfolio Explorer provides a detailed analysis of client portfolio and cash flows with the help of complex visualizations using various tables, graph and charts.

projects.name: GS-AIMS University
projects.summary: Goldman Sachs AIMS University provides a range of educational programs, courses, course modules, lessons, instructor courses, and quizzes. It keeps track of the users learning progress.

projects.name: GSCIO-AIMS (Goldman Sachs CIO - Alternate Investment Manager Selection)
projects.summary: The Alternative Investments & Manager Selection (“AIMS”) provides investors with investment and advisory solutions, across leading hedge fund managers, private equity funds, real estate managers, public equity strategies, fixed income strategies etc. .

projects.name: IMS (Insurance Management System)
projects.summary: Secure Vision's Insurance Management System (IMS), automates the key processes involved in providing multiple Insurance plans to its customers and experience to its users with user friendly subsystems. This also provides Secure Vision a platform to manage Insurance business and its clientele.

projects.name: MISMS (Multiple Installment Scheme Management System)
projects.summary: Secure Vision's MISMS (Multiple Installment Scheme Management System), automates the processes involved in managing Multiple Installment Scheme and experience to its users with user friendly subsystems.

projects.name: NAIP, Nematology Project
projects.summary: NAIP, a research project carried by division of Nematology, Indian Agricultural Research Institute (IARI), New Delhi. The project provides detailed information regarding its evolution, history, progress, deliverable, National Training,work allocations, expected outcomes, published papers, environmental and social issues, timelines etc..

projects.name: CBSE Learning
projects.summary: CBSE Learning was a public facing web site with authentication and authorization features, that provides authors and moderators to compose and publish Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE)'s learning materials like Sample Papers,  Question Papers, Chapters, latest CBSE news and events, Solved Questions from experts and many other features. This also provides administrator's desktop panel, that provides detailed information for analysis and administer. Public Users can register, login and access public and featured contents.
